・Added main story (11F story)
・Started a special login bonus where players can receive up to 2500 Arcana Gems.
・Added a Daily Dungeon where players can select rewards from EXP, evolution materials, etc.
・Started the A-head-start Order that guarantees a 4-stars Skill Record.
・Started Anime Broadcast Celebration Event.
・Other small adjustments and corrections.
*Special Log-in Bonus will be until November 30,2018 3:59 (JST/UTC+9)
*Please check for more details from the notices in the app.
